verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H1980>Go,<s%> and <S%H7069>buy<s%> a <S%H3335>potter<s%>'s <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H1228>bottle,<s%> and take some of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and of the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests;<s%>

and go <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom,<s%> which is by the <S%H6607>entry<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H2777>Harsith,<s%> and <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> there the <S%H1697>words<s%> that I shall tell <S%H1696>you;<s%>

and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H935>Behold,<s%> I will bring <S%H7451>evil<s%> on this <S%H4725>place,<s%> which whoever <S%H8085>hears,<s%> his <S%H241>ears<s%> shall <S%H6750>tingle.<s%>

Because they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H5234>me,<s%> and have estranged this <S%H4725>place,<s%> and have burned <S%H6999>incense<s%> in it to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> that they <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know, they and their <S%H1>fathers<s%> and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> and have <S%H4390>filled<s%> this <S%H4725>place<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H5355>innocents,<s%>

and have <S%H1129>built<s%> the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> to <S%H8313>burn<s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%> for burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> to <S%H1168>Baal;<s%> which I <S%H6680>didn't<s%> command, nor <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5927>it,<s%> neither came it into my <S%H3820>mind:<s%>

<S%H3117>therefore,<s%> behold, the days <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that this <S%H4725>place<s%> shall no more be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H8612>Topheth,<s%> nor The <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom,<s%> but The <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2028>Slaughter.<s%>

I will make <S%H1238>void<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in this <S%H4725>place;<s%> and I will cause them to <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>life:<s%> and their dead <S%H5038>bodies<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> to be <S%H3978>food<s%> for the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and for the <S%H929>animals<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

I will <S%H7760>make<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%> an <S%H8047>astonishment,<s%> and a <S%H8322>hissing;<s%> everyone who <S%H5674>passes<s%> thereby shall be <S%H8074>astonished<s%> and <S%H8319>hiss<s%> because of all its <S%H4347>plagues.<s%>

I will cause them to <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of their <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> and they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H7453>friend,<s%> in the <S%H4692>siege<s%> and in the <S%H4689>distress,<s%> with which their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>life,<s%> shall distress <S%H6693>them.<s%>
Then you shall <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H1228>bottle<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> who go with <S%H1980>you,<s%>

and shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> Even <S%H3602>so<s%> will I <S%H7665>break<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%> and this <S%H5892>city,<s%> as one <S%H7665>breaks<s%> a <S%H3335>potter<s%>'s <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> that <S%H3201>can't<s%> be made whole <S%H7495>again;<s%> and they shall <S%H6912>bury<s%> in <S%H8612>Topheth,<s%> until there is no <S%H4725>place<s%> to <S%H6912>bury.<s%>

Thus will I <S%H6213>do<s%> to this <S%H4725>place,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and to its <S%H3427>inhabitants,<s%> even <S%H5414>making<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%> as <S%H8612>Topheth:<s%>

and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> which are <S%H2931>defiled,<s%> shall be as the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H8612>Topheth,<s%> even all the <S%H1004>houses<s%> on whose <S%H1406>roofs<s%> they have burned <S%H6999>incense<s%> to all the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and have poured <S%H5258>out<s%> drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>

Then <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from <S%H8612>Topheth,<s%> where <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> him to <S%H5012>prophesy;<s%> and he <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people:<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H935>Behold,<s%> I will bring on this <S%H5892>city<s%> and on all its <S%H5892>towns<s%> all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I have <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> against <S%H6203>it;<s%> because they have made their neck <S%H7185>stiff,<s%> that they may not <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H1697>words.<s%>
